meta.title_zh: 排隊與等待：店員很忙，你要催一下

dialogue.zh:
嗨, sorry the wait.
こんにちは, sorry for the wait.

不 worries.
いいえ worries.

dialogue.text: It’s a bit busy right now.
dialogue.zh:
It’s a bit busy right now.
It’s a bit busy right now.

我 可以 see that.
私 できます see that.

dialogue.text: Are you here to pay or pick up a package?
dialogue.zh:
是 你 here to pay or pick up a package?
Are あなた here to pay or pick up a package?

To pick up a package.
To pick up a package.

dialogue.text: May I see your pickup code?
dialogue.zh:
May 我 see your pickup code?
May 私 see your pickup code?

當然, here it 是.
もちろん, here it 私.

謝謝. 請 wait a moment.
ありがとう. お願いします wait a moment.

好的.
わかりました.

我’ll check in the back.
私’ll check in the back.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: While you wait, do you need to pay for anything?
dialogue.zh:
While 你 wait, 你 需要 to pay anything?
While あなた wait, do あなた 必要 to pay for anything?

不, just the package.
いいえ, just the package.

dialogue.text: Alright. It might take two minutes.
dialogue.zh:
Alright. It might take two minutes.
Alright. It might take two minutes.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Sorry, can I ask how long?
dialogue.zh:
Sorry, 可以 我 ask how long?
Sorry, できます 私 ask how long?

Maybe one more minute.
Maybe one more minute.

謝謝 checking.
ありがとう for checking.

Of course.
Of course.

dialogue.text: Here it is. Please confirm your name.
dialogue.zh:
Here it 是. 請 confirm your name.
Here it 私. お願いします confirm your name.

My name 是 Raymond Lin.
My name 私 Raymond Lin.

太好了. 請 sign here.
いいですね. お願いします sign here.

(Signs)
(Signs)

Would 你 like a 袋子?
Would あなた like a 袋?

不, 我’m fine.
いいえ, 私’m fine.

All set. Sorry again.
All set. Sorry again.

It’s 好的. 謝謝.
It’s わかりました. ありがとう.

有 a good evening.
Have a good evening.

你 too.
あなた too.
